Start.DialogueLine: So, detective, w-what is it you wanted to talk about?
Start.Choice2Text: Why did you kill her? You sick bastard.

EmpathyEntry1.DialogueLine: Well... It's hard. I appreciate you asking, but I-- I-- Sorry.

EmpathyEntry2.DialogueLine: Let's... just get on with this. How can I help you solve her murder?
EmpathyEntry2.Choice1Text: Do you know anyone who had a grudge against her?
EmpathyEntry2.Choice2Text: I never mentioned she was murdered...

InfoEntry1.DialogueLine: I... I don't know. She was a good person. I can't think of anyone who would want to hurt her.

DefensiveEndEntry2.DialogueLine: Oh, is that how you wanna play? I ain't sayin' another word without my lawyer.

ExhaustedDialogue.DialogueLine: We've already talked everything there was to talk about.
